description:
Maruko has to clean up her room since her teacher is coming to visit. Although she succeeds in making it happen, she still gets into trouble, for a good reason. Then, a tutor is coming to teach Sakiko. Maruko has high expectations, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: "Kyou wa Kateihoumon no Hi" no Maki / "Kateikyoushi ga Yatte Kita" no Maki
Today`s Home Visit Day / A Tutor Is Coming
「今日は家庭訪問の日」の巻 / 「家庭教師がやってきた」の巻
